posts.author: Thomas Edison
posts.content: Hell, there are no rules here-- we're trying to accomplish something.
posts.comments: Отличная работа! Ваш талант и творчество впечатляют.

posts.author: Thomas Edison
posts.content: As a cure for worrying, work is better than whisky.
posts.comments: Спасибо за подробный и информативный пост. Очень полезно!

posts.author: Thomas Edison
posts.content: Faith, as well intentioned as it may be, must be built on facts, not fiction--faith in fiction is a damnable false hope.
posts.comments: Прекрасное фото! Очень хорошо передана атмосфера.

posts.author: Thomas Edison
posts.content: If we all did the things we are capable of doing, we would literally astound ourselves.
posts.comments: Вы сделали настоящий шедевр! Ваше умение поразительно.

posts.author: Charles Dickens
posts.content: Reflect on your present blessings, of which every man has many; not on your past misfortunes, of which all men have some.
posts.comments: Просто восхитительно! Ваш талант не знает границ.

posts.author: Thomas Edison
posts.content: I never did anything worth doing by accident, nor did any of my inventions come by accident
posts.comments: Отличная статья! Я узнал много нового и интересного.

posts.author: Thomas Edison
posts.content: Everything comes to him who hustles while he waits.
posts.comments: Ваше представление было захватывающим! Браво!

posts.author: Thomas Edison
posts.content: There is no expedient to which a man will not go to avoid the labor of thinking.
posts.comments: Ваши идеи всегда уникальны и инновационны. Я восхищаюсь вашим мышлением.

posts.author: Charles Dickens
posts.content: Subdue your appetites, my dears, and you've conquered human nature.
posts.comments: Отличная работа в команде! Ваши усилия помогли достичь великолепных результатов.

posts.author: Charles Dickens
posts.content: Train up a fig tree in the way it should go, and when you are old sit under the shade of it.
posts.comments: Ваши исследования имеют большое значение. Спасибо, что делитесь своими открытиями с миром.

posts.author: Thomas Edison
posts.content: Opportunity is missed by most people because it is dressed in overalls and looks like work.
posts.comments: Спасибо за то, что всегда поднимаете настроение своими забавными комментариями.

posts.author: Charles Dickens
posts.content: Minds, like bodies, will often fall into a pimpled, ill-conditioned state from mere excess of comfort.
posts.comments: Я восхищен вашим профессионализмом. Продолжайте в том же духе!

posts.author: Thomas Edison
posts.content: Results! Why, man, I have gotten a lot of results. I know several thousand things that won't work.
posts.comments: У вас такой талант к письму. Ваши слова олицетворяют красоту и глубину.

posts.author: Thomas Edison
posts.content: I never did a day's work in my life.  It was all fun.
posts.comments: Вы всегда приносите радость и позитив. Спасибо за это!.

posts.author: Thomas Edison
posts.content: The doctor of the future will give no medicine, but will interest her or his patients in the care of the human frame, in a proper diet, and in the cause and prevention of disease.
posts.comments: Просто восхитительно! Ваш талант не знает границ.

posts.author: Thomas Edison
posts.content: We don't know a millionth of one percent about anything.
posts.comments: Какой потрясающий обзор! У меня возникло желание попробовать это самому.

posts.author: Thomas Edison
posts.content: To invent, you need a good imagination and a pile of junk.
posts.comments: Очень интересный исследовательский материал. Спасибо за деление знаниями.

posts.author: Charles Dickens
posts.content: We need never be ashamed of our tears.
posts.comments: Отличная работа! Ваш талант и творчество впечатляют.

posts.author: Charles Dickens
posts.content: No one is useless in this world who lightens the burdens of another.
posts.comments: Вы сделали настоящий шедевр! Ваше умение поразительно.

posts.author: Albert Einstein
posts.content: Imagination is more important than knowledge.
posts.comments: This quote emphasizes the significance of imagination in the pursuit of knowledge.

posts.content: Imagination is more important than knowledge.
posts.comments: This quote emphasizes the significance of imagination in the pursuit of knowledge.

posts.author: Albert Einstein
posts.content: Imagination
posts.comments: This quote emphasizes the significance of imagination in the pursuit of knowledge.
